pending module name
===================

Usage
-----

### server.js

```js

var express = require('express');
var io = require('socket.io');
var app = express();
var server = http.createServer(app);
var sockets = io.listen(server);

var viewport = require('pending module name');
viewport.mount({
  
  //
  // serverside viewport requires listening socket.io instance
  //

  sockets: sockets

  //
  // serverside viewport requires listening express type app instance
  //

  app: app

});


server.listen(3000, 'localhost', function() {
  console.log('http://%s:%s', server.address().address, server.address().port);
});


```

### main.js (clientside)

Assumes clientside uses requirejs

```js

requirejs.config( {
  'packages': ['viewport']
} );

requirejs(['/socket.io/socket.io.js', 'viewport'], function(io, Viewport) {

  new Viewport({

    //
    // clientside viewport requires a dom element (div)
    //

    container: document.getElementById('viewport'),

    //
    // clientside viewport requires a connected socket.io
    //

    socket: io.connect(),

    //
    // clientside viewport requires a group name
    //

    group: 'viewport groupname'

  });

});


```
